products.name: Arabica
products.recipe: To make a cup of Arabica coffee, grind Arabica coffee beans to a medium consistency. Use a drip coffee maker or a pour-over setup. Add 1-2 tablespoons of coffee grounds per 6 ounces of water. Brew and enjoy!

products.name: Robusta
products.recipe: For a strong Robusta coffee, grind Robusta coffee beans to a fine consistency. Use an espresso machine or a moka pot. Brew a shot of espresso and savor the bold and robust flavor.

products.name: Colombian Supremo
products.recipe: To prepare a cup of Colombian Supremo coffee, use a drip coffee maker or a French press. Grind the beans to a medium consistency, and brew using hot water. Enjoy its well-rounded flavor.

products.name: Sumatra Mandheling
products.recipe: For a robust Sumatra Mandheling coffee, use a French press. Coarsely grind the beans and steep in hot water for a few minutes. Press the plunger and savor its rich and spicy flavor.

products.name: Kenyan AA
products.recipe: To experience the flavors of Kenyan AA coffee, use a pour-over method. Grind the beans to a medium consistency and carefully pour hot water over them. Enjoy the vibrant and fruity taste.

products.name: Hawaiian Kona
products.recipe: For a taste of Hawaiian Kona, use a drip coffee maker. Grind the beans to a medium consistency and brew with hot water. Savor the unique flavors of Hawaii.

products.name: Latte
products.recipe: A classic coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk. It offers a balanced and creamy flavor.

products.name: Mocha
products.recipe: A delightful coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate. It's perfect for those who love a combination of coffee and cocoa flavors.

products.name: Caramel Macchiato
products.recipe: A sweet and indulgent coffee drink with espresso, caramel, and frothy milk. It's a popular choice for those with a sweet tooth.

products.name: Espresso Shot
products.recipe: A concentrated shot of pure espresso, perfect for those who enjoy the intense and bold flavor of coffee. Served in a small cup.

products.name: Iced Coffee
products.recipe: A refreshing and chilled coffee drink, made with cold-brewed coffee, ice, and a touch of sweetness. Perfect for hot summer days.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.recipe: A classic Italian coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and frothed milk foam. It offers a rich and creamy taste.

products.name: Iced Latte
products.recipe: A refreshing coffee drink made with espresso and cold milk, served over ice. It's perfect for a hot day.
